short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chromium extension to help with triaging VS Code GitHub issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chromium extension to help with triaging GitHub issues. It was originally developed for our work in the [microsoft/vscode](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode) repo, but it can be used on any GitHub repo.

It provides a single fuzzy-filterable and keyboard-driven interface for applying milestones, labels, and assignees, and adding canned responses.
